The goal of pomodoro is to provide functions to make predictive modeling easy.

## Installation

You can install the released version of pomodoro from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("pomodoro")
library(pomodoro)
```

## Overview

Runs bagging, boosting, random forest, multinominal logistic and logistic models. The purpose of this package is to report the 
predictive modelling results with ease.
